title: About FoodyePay
subtitle: Revolutionizing restaurant payments with Web3 technology

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make restaurant payments faster, cheaper, and more rewarding for everyone.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: FoodyePay was founded with a simple idea: what if paying for food could earn you rewards instantly?

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Built by a passionate team of food lovers and blockchain engineers.
